Class TracingInterceptor

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.observability.TracingInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.grpc.ServerInterceptor
public class TracingInterceptor extends Object implements io.grpc.ServerInterceptor
OpenTelemetry-compatible tracing interceptor. Implements distributed tracing for gRPC calls without external dependencies. Can export to Jaeger, Zipkin, or other OpenTelemetry collectors.
